Plot: A man is brought in by an infertility doctor to supply him with his sperm, where he becomes the biggest sperm donor for his clinic.
Writer: Juhi Chaturvedi (dialogue), Juhi Chaturvedi (screenplay), Juhi Chaturvedi (story)
Title: Vicky Donor
Actors: Ayushmann Khurrana, Yami Gautam, Annu Kapoor, Dolly Ahluwalia
